original_text: Then the officers and rulers who were jealous of Daniel went to see what he would do. They saw that Daniel was praying to God and he was asking God for help.
korean_text: 그 무리들이 모여서 다니엘이 자기 하나님 앞에 기도하며 간구하는 것을 발견하고

sentences.original_text: went to see what he would do
They saw that Daniel was praying to God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다니엘이 하나님께 기도하고 있는 것을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: and he was asking God for help
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 하나님께 도움을 구하고 있었습니다
